name: Jasper
description:
Help Jasper touch the most Rastas. 

When you approach too close a Rasta, it disappears, it does not count a point. 

When you hit a Rasta with the shot, you gain one point.  In this version the game lasts 1 minute (or 30 seconds more if you spend on the time bonus when it appears). 

Only the best score is recorded at the end of the game. 

It is easier to play with a pad although I have also configured the keys on the keyboard. 

During the game you can display the FPS with the TAB key. 

 I will consider, depending on the interest or not of the players, to add game options (choice of the duration of the games, backups of the 10 best scores, VR version) and additional levels.

JASPER Game version beta 1.0 from Luc BIANCO on Vimeo.
